name: Power Washing Clean Simulator
description:
A satisfying power washing experience lies ahead! Want to fire off a high pressure water jet but don’t have a power washer? Looking to let loose a stream of cleaning liquid but can’t find the material? Have a love for cleaning but have nowhere to show it?
Now experience an unparalleled deep washing experience with Game Name! Use a variety of tools to blast away all types of dirt, moss, debris and impurities. Clean walls, cars and every inch of the house with your power washer. Make your power washing business successful and have a satisfying house cleaning. Lose yourself in a state of relaxing, cleansing bliss.

Wash away your stress with a concentrated jet of water. Wipe away the dirt and grime with your washer and then focus in on the small corners, nooks and crevices that are hard to reach. With your blaster, easily wash away the toughest of stains and the most stubborn bits of grime for a deeply satisfying cleaning experience. Carve out the dirt and grime however you prefer. Go sideways or vertically. Wash however you wish, clean spots one at a time or wash at random until you end up all done. Give the object a sparkling finish! Appreciate the results of your hard work by seeing a job well done.

Run your very own successful power washing business? To be the best power washer you’ve got to take on a lot of dirty jobs. You can do the job any way you want but you can’t be picky about the job you’re doing. Use the dirt as a canvas and your power washer as a brush. Paint your very own work of art into the muddy object. Turn your art into a completed job after washing away all the dirt on the object.

Get the unmatched satisfaction of cleaning and power washing for an oddly satisfying experience.
